sn55.30:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
sn55.30:1.2: Atha kho nandako licchavimahāmatto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho nandakaṃ licchavimahāmattaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn55.30:2.1: “Catūhi kho, nandaka, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.30:2.3: Idha, nandaka, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.30:2.4: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.30:2.7: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi …pe… samādhisaṃvattanikehi.
sn55.30:2.8: Imehi kho, nandaka, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.30:3.1: Imehi ca pana, nandaka, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako āyunā saṃyutto hoti dibbenapi mānusenapi;
sn55.30:3.6: Taṃ kho panāhaṃ, nandaka, nāññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā sutvā vadāmi. Api ca yadeva mayā sāmaṃ ñātaṃ sāmaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sāmaṃ viditaṃ, tadevāhaṃ vadāmī”ti.
sn55.30:4.1: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro puriso nandakaṃ licchavimahāmattaṃ etadavoca:
